timeline.bodyText: I think it would be redundant to add some of these asserts because if a forwarded class exists, an object will be created, otherwise, it returns null. What do you think?
timeline.author: code-incubus

replies.bodyText: OK then please check if the returned object is of right class. That is all; this is becasue of code changes in the future, we will be notified by the failing test. Otherwise, if we are just checking for "notNull", we will not be notified, test will nto fail and we might miss an important bug.
replies.author: LeoNerdoG

timeline.message:
Added JUnit tests for several packages

Signed-off-by: Nemanja Milutinović <nemanja.milutinovic@comtrade.com>

Added JUnit tests for Event, Metric and Util package
